2+ Level 4 Normal Monsters

If this card is in your GY: You can target 1 "Drytron" monster you control; it loses exactly 1000 ATK until the end of your opponent's turn, and if it does, add this card to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Glimmering Drytronis" once per turn.
1717113.name: Glimmering Drytronis

1718244.effect: Cannot be Special Summoned. During your Main Phase: You can target 1 Spell/Trap you control; destroy it, and if you do, during your Main Phase this turn, you can Normal Summon 1 Level 4 or lower monster, in addition to your Normal Summon/Set, but you cannot activate cards or effects when it is Summoned/Set. (You can only gain this effect once per turn.)
1718244.name: Krystalline Aberration

1718261.effect: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by banishing 4 monsters from your GY (1 EARTH, 1 WATER, 1 FIRE, and 1 WIND). Negate the effects of all face-up DIVINE and Divine-Beast monsters your opponent controls. If this card declares an attack: You can make this card's ATK/DEF each become double its current ATK/DEF. If this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent: You can pay half your LP; this card can attack again in a row. You can only use this effect of "One with Nature" once per turn.
1718261.name: One with Nature

1718345.effect: A longtime student of the mysteries of Flame Magic, she is at her best when she is channeling her potent abilities into her allies.
1718345.name: Flamvell Witch

1718368.effect: A simple but elegant perennial, tended to by the local fey populatoin. It is a dying species, and when threatened, it can disorient threats both real and apparent.
1718368.name: Enticing Flower
1718368.pendulum_effect: Once per turn: You can target 1 Plant monster you control and 1 monster your opponent controls; switch control of both monsters.

1718388.effect: (This monster's original Type is treated as Yokai rather than Fiend.)A devious spider Yokai which prefers to frighten all manners of creatures, primarily by hovering inches above the sleeping face of an unfortunate soul. It has a lot of time under its belt observing the inner turmoil of many a face.
1718388.name: Gomogomo
1718388.pendulum_effect: Once per turn: You can target 1 Yokai monster you control and 1 card in either GY; equip that card in the GY to that first target, then destroy this card.

1719736.effect: I told you NOT to mess with me, and now you'll face the consequences!
1719736.name: Bearpaw Zealot

1719771.effect: Target 1 Normal Monster you control; Special Summon 1 Normal Monster from your Deck with a lower Level than that target's Level. You can banish 1 Normal Monster from your GY; add this card from your GY to your hand, but for the rest of this turn, you cannot Summon Effect Monsters. You can only use this effect of "Knighting" once per turn.
1719771.name: Knighting

1719802.effect: "Give me your weak and heavy-laden. They'll do just fine for my compost."
1719802.name: Faerdosh, Determiner

1719811.effect: Activate 1 of these effects.● Pay 2000 LP; Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower Wyrm Normal Monster from your Deck in Defense Position.● If you control a Wyrm Normal Monster: You can take control of 1 monster your opponent controls.You can only activate 1 "Faerdosh's Embrace" per turn.
1719811.name: Faerdosh's Embrace

1719831.effect: A peculiar fish that distorts space around it, rendering itself as a conglomerate of many similarly-sized tiles.
1719831.name: Mosaic Barracuda
1719831.pendulum_effect: Once per turn: You can reveal 1 Fish monster from your hand; increase or reduce this card's Pendulum Scale by the Level of that monster.

1719913.name: Drone Recon'er
1719913.pendulum_effect: Once per turn, if you control no monsters: You can Special Summon 1 Level 1 Cyberse monster from your hand, and if you do, draw 1 card.

1719940.effect: The strange gas it emits is lethal, yet those who gaze upon it and manage to live appear to have increased vitality.
1719940.name: Gaseous Relic
1719940.pendulum_effect: Rock monsters you control gain 600 DEF. Once per turn: You can banish 3 Rock monsters from your GY; draw 1 card.

1722780.effect: Destroy 1 other card you control. You can only use each of the following effects of "Ruination Magic: Flame's Bite" once per turn.● If this card is destroyed: You can inflict 200 damage to your opponent for each face-up card in their possession.● If this card is in your GY: You can banish this card and 1 other Trap from your GY; destroy 1 face-up monster your opponent controls.
1722780.name: Ruination Magic: Flame's Bite

1722788.effect: Destroy 1 other card you control. You can only use each of the following effects of "Ruination Magic: Premonition" once per turn.● If this card is destroyed: You can add 1 "Ruination Mag" card from your Deck to your hand.● If this card is in your GY: You can banish this card and 1 other Trap from your GY; destroy 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls.
1722788.name: Ruination Magic: Premonition

1722800.effect: If this card is in your hand: You can destroy 2 Spells/Traps from your hand or field, and if you do, Special Summon this card. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can destroy 1 Trap in your Deck, then, if your opponent controls no Spells/Traps, you can destroy the top card of your Deck. You can only use each effect of "Ruination Mage: Tara" once per turn.
1722800.name: Ruination Mage: Tara

1722823.effect: Destroy 1 other card you control. You can only use each of the following effects of "Ruination Magic: Ushering" once per turn.● If this card is destroyed: You can destroy the top 2 cards of your Deck.● If this card is in your GY: You can banish this card and 1 other Trap from your GY; draw 2 card, then destroy 1 card in your hand.
1722823.name: Ruination Magic: Ushering

1722829.effect: Destroy 1 other card you control. You can only use each of the following effects of "Ruination Magic: Ushering" once per turn.● If this card is destroyed: You can Special Summon 1 "Ruination Mage" monster from your Deck.● If this card is in your GY: You can banish this card and 1 other Trap from your GY; destroy up to 2 face-down cards on the field.
1722829.name: Ruination Magic: Snap Incantation

1722838.effect: (This monster's original Type is treated as Yokai rather than Fairy.)You can Ritual Summon this card with any "Kamishika" card. Cannot be destroyed by battle. If this card is Ritual Summoned: You can target 1 card in your GY; send 1 card with the same name from your Deck to the GY. You can only use this effect of "Kamishika Pawn". At the start of the Damage Step, if this card battles: You can double its ATK/DEF.
1722838.name: Kamishika Pawn

1722845.effect: This card can be used to Ritual Summon any 1 Yokai Ritual Monster from your hand or Deck, but if you control no "Kamishika" monsters, you cannot Ritual Summon a monster from your Deck by this effect, except a "Kamishika" monster. You must also Tribute monsters from your hand or field whose total Levels equal or exceed the Level of the Ritual Monster you Ritual Summon. You cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck the turn you activate this effect, except Yokai monsters. You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 "Kamishika" monster you control; this turn, it can make up to 2 attacks on monsters during each Battle Phase.

1722895.effect: (This monster's original Type is treated as Yokai rather than Fairy.)You can Ritual Summon this card with any "Kamishika" card. Cannot be destroyed by battle. If this card is Ritual Summoned: You can Ritual Summon 1 Ritual Monster from your GY by Tributing Yokai monsters from your Deck. You can only use this effect of "Kamishika Envoy" once per turn. If an attack is declared involving this card: You can target 1 card on the field; destroy it.

1722908.effect: (This monster's original Type is treated as Yokai rather than Fairy.)You can Ritual Summon this card with any "Kamishika" card. Cannot be destroyed by battle. If this card is Ritual Summoned: You can add 1 "Kamishika" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Kamishika End Heraldress" once per turn. Once per Chain, when a card or effect is activated (Quick Effect): You can Tribute 1 Yokai monster; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy that card.
1722908.name: Kamishika End Heraldress

1722919.effect: At the start of the Battle Phase: Apply the following effect(s), in sequence, depending on the number of Ritual Monster you control.● 1+: Change all of your opponent's monsters to face-up attack position. (Flip monsters' effects are not activated at this time.)● 2+: Your opponents monsters must attack this turn, if able.● 3+: Your opponent cannot activate cards or effects for the rest of the turn.

1722931.effect: (This monster's original Type is treated as Yokai rather than Spellcaster.)You can Ritual Summon this card with any "Kamishika" card. You can discard this card; add 1 Ritual Monster or 1 Ritual Spell from your Deck to your hand, but if you control no "Kamishika" monsters, you can only add "Kamishika" cards to your hand with this effect. If this card is Tributed: You can gain 2500 LP.

1722975.effect: (This monster's original Type is treated as Yokai rather than Spellcaster.)If this card is Normal Summoned: You can add 1 "Kamishika" card from your Deck to your hand, except "Kamishika Reader". If this card is Tributed for a Ritual Summon: That monster gains this effect. You can only use the preceding effect of "Kamishika Reader" once per turn.● Once per turn, if this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent: You can discard 1 card; this card can attack again in a row.

1724141.effect: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be either Special Summoned (from your hand) by banishing 2 "Metaphys" cards from your field or GY, or by a "Metaphys" card effect. Gains 300 ATK for each banished card. If a Spell/Trap Card or effect is activated: You can banish the monster your opponent controls with the most ATK (your choice, if tied). During the Standby Phase: You can inflict 300 damage to your opponent for each of your banished "Metaphys" cards. You can only use each effect of "Metaphys Gandora" once per turn.

1724521.effect: 2+ Level 2 monstersGains 300 ATK/DEF for each card on the field. If this card is Xyz Summoned: You can detach any number of materials from this card; shuffle an equal number of banished cards into the Deck. If this card is sent to the GY: You can Special Summon 1 monster from your opponent's GY in face-down Defense Position.

1725234.effect: (This monster's original Type is treated as Yokai rather than Spellcaster.)If this card is Normal Summoned: You can excavate the top 5 cards of your Deck, and if you do, add 1 excavated Ritual Monster and/or 1 excavated Ritual Spell, but if you control no other "Kamishika" monsters, you can only add "Kamishika" cards to your hand by this effect. If this card is Tributed for a Ritual Summon: That monster gains this effect. You can only use the preceding effect of "Kamishika Daredevil" once per turn.● Once per turn, this card cannot be destroyed by card effects.

1725238.effect: (This monster's original Type is treated as Yokai rather than Fairy.)You can Ritual Summon this card with any "Kamishika" card.

1725243.effect: (This monster's original Type is treated as Yokai rather than Spellcaster.)If you control no monsters, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). You can Tribute this card and 1 monster from your hand; add 1 non-Ritual "Kamishika" monster from your Deck to your hand, except "Kamishika Disciple". You can only use this effect of "Kamishika Disciple" once per turn. When you Ritual Summon a Yokai monster, you can banish this card from your GY as 1 of the monsters required for the Ritual Summon.

1728920.effect: If this card on the field is destroyed: You can Special Summon it. You can only use this effect of "Krystalline Kannon" once per Duel.

1728920.pendulum_effect: During your Main Phase: You can target 1 monster you control; destroy it, and if you do, you can activate 1 Continuous Trap Card from your hand this turn. You can only use this effect of "Krystalline Kannon" once per turn.

1728935.effect: Target 1 monster and 1 other Spell/Trap on the field, including a card you control; destroy them, and if you do, you can banish any number of cards destroyed by this effect. If this Set card you control is destroyed: You can add 1 "Krystalline" monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Krystalline Bombardiering" once per turn.

1729388.effect: If this card is Normal Summoned: You can add 1 "Concat" card from your Deck to your hand. When a card or effect is activated (Quick Effect): You can draw 1 card, then discard 1 card. You can only use each effect of "Concat Imager" once per turn.

You can only use each effect of "Concat Justice" once per turn.

1729411.effect: During the Main Phase, you can: Immediately after this effect resolves, Normal Summon 1 "Concat" monster, then inflict damage to your opponent equal to its Level x 200. If this card is discarded to the GY: You can inflict 300 damage to your opponent for each card they control. You can only use each effect of "Concat Misery" once per turn.

1735847.effect:
FLIP: You can target 1 face-up monster on the field; destroy it, and if you do, gain LP equal to the ATK it had on the field.
You take no battle damage from attacks involving "Botania" monsters you control.

1735847.pendulum_effect: You can Set 1 "Botania" card from your Deck, except "Viam, Maiden of Botania". You can only use this effect of "Viam, Maiden of Botania" once per turn.

1735864.effect:
FLIP: You can target 1 monster your opponent controls that was Special Summoned from the Extra Deck; the next time your opponent Special Summons a monster from their Extra Deck with the same original Type or Attribute, destroy that monster immediately after it is Summoned.
"Botania" monsters you control are unaffected by the effects of your opponent's Defense Position monsters.

1735864.pendulum_effect: You can Set 1 "Botania" card from your Deck, except "Summer Cherries of Botania". You can only use this effect of "Summer Cherries of Botania" once per turn.

1736008.effect:
FLIP: You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; this card gains ATK/DEF equal to that monster's ATK on the field, then you can change this card's battle position, also negate the effects of that target until the end of the next turn.
"Botania" monsters you control cannot be destroyed by battle while in Attack Position.

1736008.pendulum_effect: You can Set 1 "Botania" card from your Deck, except "Nicol, Musketeer of Botania". You can only use this effect of "Nicol, Musketeer of Botania" once per turn.

1736017.effect: While you have 2 "Botania" cards in your Pendulum Zones, their scales are treated as 0 and 13. If you Pendulum Summon a monster(s): Change any number of those monsters to face-down Defense Position (min. 1), then destroy this card, and if you do, draw 1 card.

1736023.effect:
FLIP: You can target up to 2 face-down cards on the field; destroy them.
"Botania" monsters you control can attack while in face-up Defense Position. If they do, apply their ATK or DEF (whichever is higher) for damage calculation.

1736023.pendulum_effect: You can Set 1 "Botania" card from your Deck, except "Temis, Buckler of Botania". You can only use this effect of "Temis, Buckler of Botania" once per turn.

1736025.effect: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Banish monsters your opponent controls, up to the number of face-up "Botania" monsters you control. You can only activate 1 "Botania Riposte" per turn.

If a monster is Special Summoned from your opponent's Extra Deck, while this card is in your GY (except during the Damage Step): You can Set this card, but banish it when it leaves the field.

You can only use this effect of "Hooligany Fighter - Dashing Greed" once per turn. At the start of the Damage Step, when your "Hooligany" monster battles: You can double your battling monster's ATK/DEF.

1736881.effect: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Hooligany" card from your Deck to your hand. If this card declares an attack: You can Special Summon any number of EARTH Fiend monsters from your hand with different names.

1736887.effect: You can reveal this card in your hand; excavate the top 3 cards of your Deck, and if you do, you can add any number of excavated "Hooligany" cards to your hand, also shuffle the rest into the Deck. You can only use this effect of "Hooligany Fighter - Layback Sloth" once per turn. If a monster you control inflicts battle damage to your opponent: You can send 1 card from each field to the GY.

1736903.effect: If you control a "Hooligany" monster: You can place this card from your hand in your Spell & Trap Zone as a Continuous Trap. You can only use this effect of "Hooligany Techee - Strength Trainer" once per turn.

You can only use this effect of "Hooligany Techee - Aerial Broadcaster" once per turn.

1736914.effect: If you control a "Hooligany" monster: You can place this card from your hand in your Spell & Trap Zone as a Continuous Trap. You can only use this effect of "Hooligany Techee - Background Coordinator" once per turn.

1736919.effect: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by controlling 3 or more face-up "Hooligany" cards with different names. 1736927.effect: If your opponent controls more monsters than you do: Special Summon 1 "Hooligany Fighter" monster from your hand, then place 1 "Hooligany" card from your hand on the bottom of your Deck, and if you do, draw 2 cards.

1737474.effect: "Botania" monsters you control gain 500 ATK/DEF. If your opponent Special Summons a monster: You can target 1 Set "Botania" monster you control; change its battle position. 1737487.effect: 3 Flip monstersWhen a card or effect is activated (Quick Effect): You can shuffle 2 face-up Flip monsters from your Extra Deck into the Deck; negate the activation, and if you do, banish it, then you can change the battle position of 1 monster this card points to. During the End Phase: You can Special Summon 1 face-up Flip monster from your Extra Deck in face-up or face-down Defense Position. You can only use each effect of "Lylee, Valiant of Botania" once per turn.

1737560.effect:
FLIP: You can Set 1 "Botania" card from your GY, except "Mira, Petitioner of Botania".
Your opponent cannot target Set cards you control with card effects.

1737560.pendulum_effect: You can Set 1 "Botania" card from your Deck, "Mira, Petitioner of Botania". You can only use this effect of "Mira, Petitioner of Botania" once per turn.

1737578.effect: FLIP: You can negate the effects of all face-up cards your opponent currently controls until the end of the next turn.If you control at least 2 face-up "Botania" cards: You can reveal this card in your hand; destroy as many face-up Spells/Traps you control as possible, then Special Summon this card from your hand in face-up or face-down Defense Position, and if you do, draw 1 card. You can only use each effect of "Grand Harvester of Botania" once per turn.

1737878.effect: Add 2 face-up "Botania" Pendulum Monsters from your Extra Deck to your hand. You can only activate 1 "Botania Pruning" per turn.

1739002.effect:
2 WATER monsters, including an "Aquaactress" monster
If this card is Link Summoned: You can send 1 Aqua monster from your Deck to the GY, but it cannot activate its effects in the GY this turn. When your opponent activates a card or effect that would destroy or banish an "Aquaactress" or "Aquarium" card(s) you control (Quick Effect): You can send 1 face-up Spell you control to the GY; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it. You can only use each effect of "Aquaactress Sicta" once per turn.
1739002.name: Aquaactress Sicta

1739021.effect: When this card is activated: You can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower WATER monster from your hand or 1 "Aquaactress" monster from your hand or Deck, but if you Special Summon from the Deck by this effect, that monster cannot be used as material for a Synchro, Xyz, or Link Summon, except for the Summon of an "Aquaactress" monster. If this card is sent from the field to the GY: You can target 1 Aqua monster in your GY; Special Summon it, also you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except Aqua monsters. You can only activate 1 "Aquarium Performance" per turn.

1740952.effect: 2 monsters with different namesMust first be either Fusion Summoned using only monsters in your possession, or Special Summoned (from your Extra Deck) by banishing the above cards you control (in which case you do not use "Polymerization"). You can only Special Summon "Drometainer Astound(s)" once per turn. If this card is Special Summoned: You can banish 1 card from your hand; inflict 300 damage to your opponent for each card in their hand, then, if this is in the Extra Monster Zone, you can draw 1 card. Fusion Monsters you control gain 700 ATK/DEF.
1740952.name: Drometainer Astound

1740965.effect: 2 monsters with different namesMust first be either Fusion Summoned using only monsters in your possession, or Special Summoned (from your Extra Deck) by banishing the above cards you control (in which case you do not use "Polymerization"). You can only Special Summon "Drometainer Parade(s)" once per turn. If this card is Special Summoned: You can banish 1 card from your hand; send 1 face-up Attack Position monster on the field with 3000 or more ATK to the GY, then, if this is in the Extra Monster Zone, you can draw 1 card. Fusion Monsters you control canot be targeted by your opponent's card effects.

1740976.effect: If you control no monsters, or if you control a Fusion Monster, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). You can Set this card without Tributing. If you do not use "Demystarian, Drometainer's Druid" as Fusion Material, you cannot banish monsters from your GY as Fusion Material for this effect.

1741305.effect: 4 monsters with different namesMust first be either Fusion Summoned using only monsters in your possession, or Special Summoned (from your Extra Deck) by banishing the above cards you control (in which case you do not use "Polymerization"). You can only Special Summon "Drometainer Bewilder(s)" once per turn. If this card is Special Summoned: You can banish 1 card from your hand; change as many of your opponent's face-up Attack Position monsters to face-down Defense Position as possible, then, if this is in the Extra Monster Zone, you can draw 1 card. If your Fusion Monster attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage.

1741320.effect: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by banishing 1 other card from your hand. Cannot be used as material, except as Fusion Material. If this card is banished: You can return it to the GY. You can only use this effect of "Drometainer Apprentice" once per turn.

1743570.effect: Ritual Summon 1 "Preimage" Ritual Monster from your hand, by Tributing at least 2 Ritual Monsters from your Deck with different Levels, whose total Levels exactly equal the Level of the Ritual Monster you Ritual Summon. If you control no monsters, you can Ritual Summon from the Deck, instead, and if you do, you cannot Special Summon monsters from the Deck for the rest of this turn, except "Preimage" monsters.

1743574.effect: You can Ritual Summon this card with a "Preimage" card. Gains 1000 ATK/DEF for each card you control. If this card is Special Summoned: You can banish 3 cards from your GY, face-down; send 1 Level 2 or higher "Phlogistonite" monster from your Deck to the GY. You can only use this effect of "Phlogistonite Originator" once per turn.

1760767.effect: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your GY) by discarding 1 "Phlogistonite" monster from your hand. You can only Special Summon "Phlogistonite Devourer" once per turn this way. Monsters you control gain 300 ATK/DEF for each banished card. If this card is Special Summoned: You can banish 3 cards from your GY, face-down; banish up to 3 cards from your opponent's GY, face-down. You can only use this effect of "Phlogistonite Devourer" once per turn.
1760767.name: Phlogistonite Devourer

1760778.effect: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your GY) while you control a "Phlogistonite" monster and have no cards in your hand. 1760904.effect:
(This card's original Level is always treated as 12.)
Cannot be Synchro Summoned. Must be Special Summoned (from your Extra Deck) by sending 2 Level 8 or higher monsters you control with the same Level to the GY (1 Tuner and 1 non-Tuner). Cannot be used as Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, or Link Material. Double any damage you take. Can attack all Special Summoned monsters your opponent controls, once each. Cannot attack directly. If this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent: You can double this card's ATK/DEF until the end of the next turn.

1782226.effect:
1 non-Link "Ijakaja" monster

2+ monsters, including a "Talliterror" monster

3 Level 1 monsters

You can target 1 of your banished WATER Beast monsters; shuffle it into the Deck, then Set 1 "Halvoran" Spell/Trap from your Deck. You can only use this effect of "Halvoran Enraged" once per turn.
1959519.name: Halvoran Enraged

1959531.effect: You can target 1 of your banished "Halvoran" monsters; Special Summon it. If your "Halvoran" monster is Special Summoned: You can target 2 cards your opponent controls; destroy them. You can only use each effect of "Halvoran Outcry" once per turn.
1959531.name: Halvoran Outcry

1960164.effect:
[Requirement] During the turn this card was Normal Summoned, you can send 1 monster (Fiend) from your hand to the GY while you have no other cards in your hand.
[Effect] Send the top 3 cards of your Deck to the GY, and if there is a Normal Monster (Fiend) among them, choose 1 Trap in your GY, and add it to your hand.
1960164.name: Searing Skidding Skull

1961068.effect: If you control a "Hieratic" monster, and your opponent controls more monsters than you do, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). Once per turn: You can Tribute 1 other "Hieratic" monster from your hand or field; add 1 "Hieratic" monster from your Deck to your hand, except "Hieratic Dragon of Ptah". When this card is Tributed: Special Summon 1 Dragon Normal Monster from your hand, Deck, or GY, but make its ATK/DEF 0.
1961068.name: Hieratic Dragon of Ptah

1962749.effect:
When your opponent activates a Spell/Trap Card while you control a "Phantom Knights" monster: Special Summon this card in Defense Position as an Effect Monster (Warrior/DARK/Level 2/ATK 600/DEF 0) with the following effect. (This card is NOT treated as a Trap.) If that opponent's Spell/Trap Card would be sent to the GY after this Chain resolves, Set it to your field, instead.
● Once per turn, if all monsters you control are "Phantom Knights" monsters, you can (Quick Effect): Immediately after this effect resolves, Xyz Summon 1 DARK Xyz Monster, using only monsters you control as material.
You can only activate 1 "The Phantom Knights of Entangled Lamellar" per turn.
1962749.name: The Phantom Knights of Entangled Lamellar
1962749.treated_as: The Phantom Knights of Entangled Lamellar

1964180.effect: All "Blossomania" monsters on the field gain 600 ATK during their controller's opponent's turn only. All non-"Blossomania" monsters on the field lose 200 ATK for each "Blossomania" monster on the field. If a "Blossomania" monster(s) is destroyed by battle or card effect: You can target 1 of those monsters; Special Summon it at the start of the next phase. You can only use this effect of "Blossomania Wild" once per turn.
1964180.name: Blossomania Wild

1966143.effect:
Banish 1 card from your Deck, then apply 1 of these effects, depending on the type of banished card. For the rest of this turn, you cannot activate cards, or the effects of cards, with the same name that banished card.
● Monster: 1 monster on the field loses ATK/DEF equal to the ATK/DEF of that banished card.
● Spell: Return 1 banished card to the GY during the End Phase.
● Trap: Each player gains 2000 LP.
You can only activate 1 "Golden Wave" per turn.
1966143.name: Golden Wave

1966485.effect: When your opponent activates a monster effect: Draw until you have the same number of cards in your hand as your opponent. During the End Phase, your opponent declares 1 card type (Monster, Spell, or Trap) and 1 card category (Normal, Effect, Ritual, Continuous, Quick-Play, Field, Equip, or Counter). Reveal your entire hand, then banish any cards of the declared type and category, face-down, then take 1000 damage for each card banished by this effect. You can only activate 1 "Ledger of Demise" per turn.
1966485.name: Ledger of Demise

1966807.effect: You can reveal 1 "Phantom Knights" Trap in your hand, then target 1 "Phantom Knights" monster you control; Special Summon this card from your hand, then you can decrease the Level of that target by 1. You can banish this card from your GY; Set 1 "Phantom Knights" Trap from your hand, also it can be activated this turn. You can only use each effect of "The Phantom Knights of Jinxed Halo" once per turn.
1966807.name: The Phantom Knights of Jinxed Halo
1966807.treated_as: The Phantom Knights of Jinxed Halo

1968023.effect:
3+ Effect Monsters
For this card's Link Summon, you can also use monsters from your hand as Link Material. If you do, you cannot Summon or Set monsters until the end of your next turn, except "Roi of the Infinite Plana". Once per Chain, during your opponent's Main Phase, when your opponent activates a card or effect (Quick Effect): You can equip 1 other monster on the field or in the GY to this card, and if you do, this card gains 400 ATK. You can only use this effect of "Roi of the Infinite Plana" up to thrice per turn.
1968023.name: Roi of the Infinite Plana

1968031.effect: You can send this card from your hand to the GY; add 2 "Epsilon Within the Infinite Plana" from your Deck to your hand, also you can only Summon once for the rest of this turn. You can only use this effect of "Epsilon Within the Infinite Plana" once per turn.
1968031.name: Epsilon Within the Infinite Plana

1968038.effect: If an "Infinite Plana" monster(s) is sent to your GY: You can send this card from your hand to the GY, then target 1 of those sent cards; either add it to your hand or Special Summon it in Attack Position, then add 1 "Prover for the Infinite Plana" from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Prover for the Infinite Plana" once per turn.
1968038.name: Prover for the Infinite Plana

1968041.effect: If this card becomes equipped to an "Infinite Plana" monster: You can send this card to the GY; place this card in your Spell & Trap Zone as a Continuous Trap. During your opponent's Main Phase, if this card is treated as a Continuous Trap: You can target up to 3 cards in your GY; shuffle them into the Deck, then draw 1 card for each face-up Continuous Trap you control. You can only use each effect of "Base under the Infinite Plana" once per turn.
1968041.name: Base under the Infinite Plana

1968044.effect: If this card becomes equipped to an "Infinite Plana" monster: You can send this card to the GY; place this card in your Spell & Trap Zone as a Continuous Trap. During your opponent's Main Phase, if this card is treated as a Continuous Trap: You can target 2 face-up cards your opponent controls; destroy it. You can only use each effect of "Knighted by the Infinite Plana" once per turn.
1968044.name: Knighted by the Infinite Plana

1968048.effect: You can send this card from your hand to the GY; equip 1 "Infinite Plana" monster from your Deck to an "Infinite Plana" monster you control, then add 1 "Delta Before the Infinite Plana" from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Delta Before the Infinite Plana" once per turn.
1968048.name: Delta Before the Infinite Plana

1968052.effect: You can send this card from your hand to the GY, then target 2 "Infinite Plana" monsters in your GY, except "Lambda Beyond the Infinite Plana"; shuffle them into the Deck, then add 1 "Lambda Beyond the Infinite Plana" from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Lambda Beyond the Infinite Plana" once per turn.
1968052.name: Lambda Beyond the Infinite Plana

1968059.effect: If this card becomes equipped to an "Infinite Plana" monster: You can send this card to the GY; place this card in your Spell & Trap Zone as a Continuous Trap. During your opponent's Main Phase, if this card is treated as a Continuous Trap: You can activate this effect; each player can add 1 card from their GY to their hand, also, after that, each player with a hand shuffles their entire hand into the Deck, then draws the same number of cards they shuffled into the Deck. You can only use each effect of "Knighted by the Infinite Plana" once per turn.
1968059.name: Induction Inside the Infinite Plana

1968072.effect: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Cannot be Special Summoned, except by the effect of an "Infinite Plana" card. If this card becomes equipped to an "Infinite Plana" monster: You can send this card to the GY; place this card in your Spell & Trap Zone as a Continuous Trap. During your opponent's Main Phase, if this card is treated as a Continuous Trap: You can add 1 "Infinite Plana" card from your Deck to your hand, and if you do, your opponent must banish 3 face-down cards from their Extra Deck. You can only use each effect of "Q.E.D. after the Infinite Plana" once per turn.
1968072.name: Q.E.D. after the Infinite Plana

1968076.effect: Send 2 "Infinite Plana" monsters with different Levels from your Deck to your GY, and if you do, banish 1 "Infinite Plana[CLEAR_OUT]" from your Deck, then draw 1 card. If you have no unused Spell & Trap Zones: You can reveal this card in your hand, then target 1 face-up Continuous Trap you control; return it to the hand. You can only use each effect of "Infinite Plana[CLEAR_OUT]" once per turn. While this card is in your GY, your opponent cannot target "Infinite Plana" Monster Cards you control with card effects during your turn.
1968076.name: Infinite Plana[CLEAR_OUT]

1968474.effect: Reveal any number of "Infinite Plana" monsters in your hand; excavate an equal number of cards from the top of your Deck, and if you do, you can add up to 3 excavated "Infinite Plana" monster to your hand, also shuffle the rest into the Deck, then banish 1 "Infinite Plana[THEORY]" from your Deck. If you have no unused Spell & Trap Zones: You can send this card from your hand to the GY; draw 5 cards instead of 1 for your normal draw during your next Draw Phase. You can only use each effect of "Infinite Plana[THEORY]" per turn, also you cannot activate other card effects the turn you activate either of this card's effects, except "Infinite Plana" card effects.
1968474.name: Infinite Plana[THEORY]

1968684.effect:
[Requirement] You can place 1 card from your hand on the bottom of your Deck.
[Effect] Choose 1 Attack Position monster your opponent controls. The ATK/DEF of all monsters with the same ATK or DEF as the chosen monster become 1500, also they cannot gain or lose ATK by other effects until the end of the next turn.
1968684.name: Militant Miltha

1969540.effect: You can send this card from your hand to the GY; reveal the top card of your Deck, and if it is an "Infinite Plana" card, and either add it to your hand or send it to the GY, also, after that, add 1 "Seer on the Infinite Plana" from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Seer on the Infinite Plana" once per turn.
1969540.name: Seer on the Infinite Plana

1970779.effect: You can send this card from your hand to the GY; reveal any number of "Infinite Plana" cards in your hand, then shuffle them into the Deck, and if you do, draw the same number of cards, then add 1 "Lemme Beside the Infinite Plana" from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Lemme Beside the Infinite Plana" once per turn.
1970779.name: Lemma Beside the Infinite Plana

1970788.effect: Cannot attack, unless you control an "Infinite Plana" Link Monster. You can send this card from your hand to the GY, then target 1 face-up card your opponent controls in the same column as an "Infinite Plana" card you control; return all cards in that column to the hand, then add 1 "Refutation Across the Infinite Plana" from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Refutation Across the Infinite Plana" once per turn.
1970788.name: Refutation Across the Infinite Plana

1970797.effect: You can send this card from your hand to the GY, then declare 3 card names; look at your opponent's hand, and if you do, add "Infinite Plana" monsters with different names from your Deck to your hand, up to the number of the declared cards in your opponent's hand, also, after that, add 1 "Precision Through the Infinite Plana" from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Precision Through the Infinite Plana" once per turn.
1970797.name: Precision Through the Infinite Plana

1974697.effect:
1 non-Link "Dark Hole" monster
You can pay 900 LP; Special Summon 1 "Dark Hole" monster from your hand or GY in Defense Position, but destroy it during the End Phase. During the End Phase: You can banish this card from your GY and reveal 1 "Dark Hole" card in your hand; take 1 of your banished "Dark Hole" monsters, and either Special Summon it in Defense Position or return it to the GY. You can only use 1 "Dark Hole Occultist" effect per turn, and only once that turn. Cannot be used as Link Material.
1974697.name: Dark Hole Occultist

1974743.effect: If this card on the field is destroyed by a card effect: You can add 1 "Dark Hole" card from your Deck to your hand, except "Dark Hole Impactor". During the End Phase: You can banish this card from your GY and reveal 1 "Dark Hole" card in your hand; destroy 1 monster you control, and if you do, destroy the top 10 cards of your opponent's Deck (or their entire Deck, if less than 10), but their effects in the GY cannot be activated until the end of your opponent's next turn. You can only use 1 "Dark Hole Impactor" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
1974743.name: Dark Hole Impactor

1974747.effect: Destroy all cards on the field in the same column as a "Dark Hole" card you control. During the End Phase, if you have another "Dark Hole" card in your GY: You can Set this card from your hand or GY, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use each effect of "Portable Dark Hole" once per turn.
1974747.name: Portable Dark Hole

1975386.effect: Target 1 of your banished "Dark Hole" cards and 1 monster your opponent controls; shuffle the first target into the Deck, and if you do, destroy the second target. During the End Phase, if this card is in your GY: You can add this card from your GY to your hand. You can only use 1 "Dark Hole Core" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
1975386.name: Dark Hole Core

1975396.effect: During the Main Phase: You can activate this effect; your opponent draws 1 to 3 cards, then you Special Summon as many "Dark Hole" monsters as possible with different names, up to the number of cards your opponent drew by this effect, up to 1 each from your hand, Deck, and GY, then destroy 1 monster you control. You can only use this effect of "Dark Hole Entanglement" once per turn.
1975396.name: Dark Hole Entanglement

1975404.effect: If a card(s) on the field is destroyed by your card effect: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can Set 1 "Dark Hole" card from your Deck. During the End Phase: You can return this card you control to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Dark Hole Dragon" once per turn.
1975404.name: Dark Hole Dragon

1975426.effect:
Activate 1 of these effects;
● Add 1 "Dark Hole" monster from your Deck to your hand.
● Add 1 "Dark Hole" from your GY to your hand, then, if you control a "Dark Hole" monster in this card's column, you can destroy that monster and 1 other card in its column.
You can only activate 1 "Dark Hole Sighting" per turn.
1975426.name: Dark Hole Sighting

1975446.effect: If this card on the field is destroyed by a card effect: You can add 1 "Dark Hole" card from your Deck to your hand, except "Dark Hole Savant". During the End Phase: You can banish this card from your GY and reveal 1 "Dark Hole" card in your hand; destroy 1 monster you control, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Dark Hole" monster from your Deck, except "Dark Hole Savant". You can only use 1 "Dark Hole Savant" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
1975446.name: Dark Hole Savant

1976421.effect: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your Deck) by Tributing 5 Winged Beast monsters from either field with different Attributes. You can only Special Summon "The Great Fowl of Cornucopic Bounty" once per Duel this way. Once per turn, when your opponent activates a card or effect (Quick Effect): You can make that effect become "each player draws 2 cards", and if you do, this card gains 500 ATK/DEF for each card in each player's hand when that effect resolves. If this card leaves the field: Each player can draw cards, up to the number of their monsters Tributed to Special Summon this card.
1976421.name: The Great Fowl of Cornucopic Bounty
1976421.treated_as: The Great Fowl of Cornucopic Bounty

1979604.effect: (Quick Effect): You can send this card from your hand to the GY; this turn, each time your opponent Special Summons a monster(s), immediately look at the top card of your Deck, then you can place that card on the top or bottom of your Deck. During the End Phase, draw 1 card for every 3 monsters your opponent Special Summoned this turn after this effect resolved. You can only use this effect of "Dark Enchantress" per turn.
1979604.name: Dark Enchantress

1981214.effect:
2+ Level 4 monsters
Cannot be used as Link Material. This card's Type/Attribute is also treated as those of its attached materials. Once per turn: You can detach 1 material from this card; it gains 1000 ATK/DEF, then you can change its original Type and/or Attribute. This card gains the following effect(s), depending on its current Type(s) and Attribute(s). ● WATER or Plant: Once per turn: You can gain LP equal to this card's ATK. ● EARTH or Machine: Cannot be destroyed by card effects. ● WIND or Winged Beast: Once per turn: You can detach 1 material from this card; shuffle 1 card from each field into the Deck, including a WIND monster.
1981214.name: Preserved Specimen from Another Age

1981268.effect:
2+ Level 4 monsters
Cannot be used as Link Material. This card's Type/Attribute is also treated as those of its attached materials. Once per turn: You can detach 1 material from this card; all monsters your opponent controls lose 1000 ATK/DEF, then you can change this card's original Type and/or Attribute. This card gains the following effect(s), depending on its current Type(s) and Attribute(s). ● LIGHT or Plant: Once per turn: You can attach the top card of each player's Deck to this card as material. ● FIRE or Pyro: Once per turn: You can inflict damage to your opponent equal to the highest original ATK on your opponent's field. ● DARK or Spellcaster: Once per turn: You can detach 2 materials from this card; draw 1 card, then send 1 card from your hand to the GY.
1981268.name: Forgotten Relic from Another Age

1981958.effect: You can target 1 monster in this card's column with a Level, then declare a different Level from 1 to 12; that target becomes that Level, also, while it is face-up on the field, it cannot be used as material for the Special Summon of a monster from the Extra Deck, except an Xyz Monster. During the Main Phase, you can: Immediately after this effect resolves, Xyz Summon 1 Xyz Monster, using monsters from either field in this card's column, and if you do, you can attach this card to it as material. You can only use 1 "Xyz Siphon" effect per turn, and only once that turn. You can only control 1 "Xyz Siphon".
1981958.name: Xyz Siphon

1983094.effect: Target 1 monster in this card's column; banish this card, and if you do, place that target in your Spell & Trap Zone in the same column as a Continuous Trap, then banish 1 Fiend monster from your Deck. You can activate 1 "Enmaddening Grasp" per turn.
1983094.name: Enmaddening Grasp

1983206.effect: Once per turn, during the Standby Phase: You can target 1 other card on the field; destroy it, then place 1 Creation Counter on this card. You can send this card to the GY; Special Summon 1 LIGHT monster from your hand or Deck whose Level is equal to the number of Creation Counters that were on this card.
1983206.name: Dagdayan Cauldron

1983221.effect:
3 Level 4 monsters
(This monster's original Type is treated as Yokai rather than Zombie.)
If a monster(s) is sent from your opponent's field to their GY: You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 of those sent monsters; banish all monsters with the same Type as that target from your opponent's GY. If a monster(s) is banished, and is now in your opponent's possession: You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 of those banished monsters; its effects are negated, also shuffle all of your opponent's banished monsters with the same Type into the Deck.
1983221.name: Vessel of Woes & Transgression

1983233.effect:
2+ Level 6 monsters
(This monster's original Type is treated as Yokai rather than Winged Beast.)
Must be Xyz Summoned. All FIRE Tokens you control gain 800 ATK/DEF for each Spell/Trap in the GY. During the Main Phase, as Chain Link 1 (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from this card; destroy up to 2 Set Spells/Traps your opponent controls, then Special Summon 1 "Fenghuang Token" (Yokai/FIRE/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0). You can only use this effect of "Mystic Fenghuang" once per turn.
1983233.name: Mystic Fenghuang

1985500.effect: If your opponent controls more monsters than you do: Special Summon any number of face-up Pendulum Monsters from your Extra Deck with different Levels, each with a Level between the Pendulum Scales of the 2 cards in your Pendulum Zones. (This is treated as a Pendulum Summon.) You cannot Pendulum Summon other monsters the turn you Summon a monster by this effect. You can only activate 1 "Pendulum Charge" per turn.
1985500.name: Pendulum Charge

1987705.effect: (Quick Effect): You can send this card from your hand to the GY; Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "Dark Hole" monster from your hand or GY, then destroy 1 card you control. If a "Dark Hole" card is added to your hand, except by drawing it: You can add this card from your GY to your hand. You can only use 1 "Dark Hole Magistrate" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
1987705.name: Dark Hole Magistrate

1987771.effect: During the Main or Battle Phase, if your opponent Special Summoned 3 or more monsters this turn (Quick Effect): You can discard this card; Special Summon 1 "Owlsh" monster from your Extra Deck. (This is treated as a Summon of the Summoned monster's card Type.) You can only use this effect of "Reckoning Owlsh" once per turn.
1987771.name: Reckoning Owlsh

1987811.effect: When an "Owlsh" monster(s) you control is targeted for an attack or by an opponent's card effect (Quick Effect): You can discard this card; negate the attack or effect, and if you do, banish that card. You can only use this effect of "Defending Owlsh" once per turn.
1987811.name: Defending Owlsh

1987819.effect:
2 LIGHT Winged Beast monsters
If this card is Fusion Summoned: Destroy as many cards in this card's column as possible, then add 1 "Owlsh" monster from your Deck to your hand. If this face-up card is in your Extra Deck (Quick Effect): You can place it in your Pendulum Zone. You can only use each effect of "Paranoid Owlsh" once per turn.
1987819.name: Paranoid Owlsh
1987819.pendulum_effect: All LIGHT Winged Beast monsters you control gain ATK equal to its Level/Rank/Link Rating x 300, also they cannot be destroyed by card effects.

1987850.effect:
1 Winged Beast Tuner + 1 non-Tuner monster
LIGHT Winged Beast monsters you control with 1500 or less original ATK can attack directly. You can only use each of the following effects of "Protective Owlsh" once per turn. If this card is Synchro Summoned: Target up to 2 "Owlsh" cards in your GY; add them to your hand. If this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent: You can target 1 card your opponent controls; send it to the GY, then each player draws 1 card.
1987850.name: Protective Owlsh

1987866.effect: If this card is in your hand and the only monsters you control are LIGHT Winged Beast monsters (min. 1) (Quick Effect): You can Special Summon it and 1 "Owlsh" monster from your Extra Deck, then discard 1 card, also you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except "Owlsh" monsters. (This is treated as a Summon of the Summoned monster's card Type.) You can only use this effect of "Messaging Owlsh" once per turn.
1987866.name: Messaging Owlsh

1987899.effect: If you control an "Owlsh" monster (Quick Effect): You can discard this card, then target 1 face-up card your opponent controls; destroy it. You can only use this effect of "Hunting Owlsh" once per turn.
1987899.name: Hunting Owlsh

1987906.effect: During the Main Phase: You can target 1 "Owlsh" monster in your GY; Special Summon it, but negate its effects for the rest of this Phase, also shuffle it into the Deck if it leaves the field this turn, then, if it is an Xyz Monster, you can attach 1 card from either GY to it as material. If the only monsters you control are LIGHT Winged Beast monsters: You can Fusion Summon 1 LIGHT Winged Beast monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or field as material. You can only use each effect of "Owlsh Cosmos" once per turn.
1987906.name: Owlsh Cosmos

1988047.effect:
If a "Owlsh" card you control is sent to the GY or banished by your opponent's card: Apply 1 of these effects, also, after that, Set this card face-down instead of sending it to the GY.
● Look at your opponent's Extra Deck and banish up to 2 cards with different names from it.
● Negate the effects of 1 face-up card on the field while it is face-up on the field.
● Banish 1 LIGHT Winged Beast monster from your Deck. During your next Standby Phase, add it to your hand.
1988047.name: Owlsh Vision

1988098.effect:
2 Level 3 LIGHT monsters
Once per turn, you can also Xyz Summon "Peaceful Owlsh" by using 1 Rank 4 Xyz Monster you control as material, that has an "Owlsh" monster as material. (Transfer its materials to this card.) While this card has material, you take no damage. Once per turn, if this card has no material: You can target 1 card on the field; attach it to this card as material. You can detach 1 material from this card; excavate cards from the top of your Deck equal to the number of LIGHT Winged Beast monsters you control, and if you do, add 1 excavated card to your hand, also shuffle the rest into the Deck. You can only use this effect of "Peaceful Owlsh" once per turn.
1988098.name: Peaceful Owlsh

1997190.effect:
2+ Level 3 monsters with the same Type
Gains 400 ATK/DEF for each card on the field. Can attack a number of times each Battle Phase, up to the number of materials attached to it +1. Once per Chain, when your opponent activates a card or effect, except during the Battle Phase (Quick Effect): Detach 1 material from this card. Once per turn, during the End Phase: You can attach any number of face-up monsters you control to this card as material, then attach as many of your opponent's monsters as possible to this card as material, that are banished or in their GY, up to the number of materials currently attached to this card.
1997190.name: Soul Sunsetter

1997197.effect: You can target 1 "Owlsh" monster in your GY; Special Summon it, but return it to the hand when it leaves the field, then you can make this card's Level become a Level from 1 to 3. You can only use this effect of "Gliding Owlsh" once per turn.
1997197.name: Gliding Owlsh

1997217.effect:
(This monster's original Type is treated as Yokai rather than Fairy.)
Cannot be destroyed by battle. Once per Chain, if either player takes damage: You can target 1 card on the field; destroy it. You can only use 1 of the of the following effects of "Rage-Awakened Beholder" per turn, and only once that turn.
● If you take damage: You can Special Summon this card from your hand or GY. 
● During the End Phase: Inflict 2000 damage to each player.
1997217.name: Rage-Awakened Beholder

1997230.effect: If a monster(s) is sent to the turn player's GY: Target 1 of them; banish it face-down, and if you do, inflict damage to the turn player's opponent equal to its original ATK, divided by the number of "Valediction" in your GY +1, then you can add 1 "Valediction" from your Deck to your hand. You can only activate 1 "Valediction" per turn.
1997230.name: Valediction

1997241.effect: Activate this card by targeting 2 monsters in your GY with the same name; Special Summon 1 and banish the other. When this card leaves the field, banish that Summoned monster. When that Summoned monster leaves the field, banish this card. You can only activate 1 "Reflective Transversal" per turn.
1997241.name: Reflective Transversal

1997280.effect: If you control no monsters: Add 1 Spellcaster "Codalock" monster from your Deck to your hand, then send 1 card from your hand or field to the GY.
1997280.name: Codalock Coronation

1997296.effect: If you control no monsters: You can Special Summon this card from your GY, then you can gain 1600 LP. When your opponent activates a monster effect (Quick Effect): You can send 1 "Codalock" Spell/Trap from your Deck to the GY that meets its activation conditions; this effect becomes that card's effect when it is activated. You can only use each effect of "Hoala, Codalock Saint" once per turn.

You cannot Set Spells/Traps during the turn you activate this effect. During the Main Phase, if you control this Special Summoned card (Quick Effect): You can discard 1 card, then target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; shuffle both it and this card into the Deck. You can only use 1 "Creantour Hare" effect per turn, and only once that turn.

2054888.effect: After you Special Summon this card you own, for the rest of this Duel, you cannot Summon monsters, nor activate monster effects, except "Creantour" monsters. If this card is Normal Summoned: You can shuffle this card into the Deck; excavate the top 5 cards of your Deck, and if you do, you can Special Summon as many excavated "Creantour" monsters as possible, also shuffle the rest into the Deck. You can only use each effect of "Creantour Bear Projection" once per turn.

3 Level 5 monsters

3 Effect Monsters, including a "Circaform" monster

3 Level 3 monsters

Then, Special Summon this card to the player's field who has more combined cards in their hand and field (your choice, if tied).

You can only use 1 "Charismatic Sanctification" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
2087363.name: Charismatic Sanctification

2087376.effect: You can Ritual Summon this card with "Charismatic Sanctification". This card can be treated as 2 monsters when used for the Link Summon of a "Charismatic" monster. 2087429.effect: You can Ritual Summon this card with "Charismatic Sanctification". This card can be treated as 2 monsters when used for the Link Summon of a "Charismatic" monster. 2089991.effect: If you control no monsters, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). You cannot Special Summon monsters that cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. FLIP: You can add 1 "Darkest Power" card, or 1 "Awor, the Darkest Stalker", from your Deck to your hand, then you can make 1 monster your opponent control lose 800 ATK.
If your opponent Summons an Effect Monster(s) from their hand: You can target 1 of those monsters; Special Summon 2 "Darkest Power Spirit Tokens" (Yokai/DARK/Level 2/ATK ?/DEF ?) whose original ATK/DEF is the ATK of that target. If this card is sent to the GY by an opponent's card: You can draw 1 card. You can only use each effect of "Darkest Power Maniac" once per turn.

2187451.effect:
(This monster's original Type is treated as Yokai rather than Fiend.)
Ruins are what remains of our culture. Remnants are what's left of us. Revenge is what we seek. Remnants no more, to ruins you shall be reduced.

During the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can take control of 1 of your opponent's monsters this card points to so that it is linked with this card. 2549894.name: Sakekle Origin

2549902.effect: If this card is Summoned: Roll a six-sided die for each monster on the field. This card gains ATK/DEF equal to the total roll x 300. You can only use each of the following effects of "Sakekle Wheel" once per turn. During your turn (Quick Effect): You can reveal this card in your hand, then target 1 "Sakekle" monster you control; Special Summon this card from your hand. If you do: Return that target to the hand.
2549902.name: Sakekle Wheel

2549908.effect: If this card is Summoned: Roll a six-sided die for each monster on the field. This card gains ATK/DEF equal to the total roll x 100. Once per turn, if you roll a six-sided die (or dice) for another "Sakekle" card, you can treat one of the results as 7. You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; return it to the hand, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Sakekle" monster from your hand. This is a Quick Effect if you control a LIGHT "Sakekle" monster. You can only use this effect of "Sakekle Visor" once per turn.
2549908.name: Sakekle Visor

2549913.effect: Activate by targeting 1 "Sakekle" monster you control and 2 cards your opponent controls; destroy them, Special Summon this card as an Effect Monster (Beast/DARK/Level 2/ATK 0/DEF 1900). (This card is also still a Trap Card.) If Summoned this way, this card cannot be destroyed by battle. During the End Phase, if this card is in your Main Monster Zone: You can target 1 "Sakekle" monster in your GY; Special Summon it, and if you do, Set this card. You can only use this effect of "Sakekle Scare" once per turn.
2549913.name: Sakekle Scare

2549918.effect: If this card is Summoned: Roll a six-sided die for each monster on the field. This card gains ATK/DEF equal to the total roll x 200. You can only use each of the following effects of "Sakekle Loom" once per turn. You can reveal this card in your hand; Special Summon up to 3 "Sakekle Dark Tokens" (Beast/DARK/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0), then Special Summon this card. If this card is Special Summoned from the hand: Tribute as many Tokens on the field as possible, then, for every 2 Tokens Tributed, you can Special Summon 1 "Sakekle" monster from your hand or GY.
2549918.name: Sakekle Loom

2549920.effect: Add 1 "Sakekle" monster from your Deck to your hand. If a "Sakekle" monster(s) you control would be destroyed, you can banish this card from your hand or GY, instead. You can only activate 1 "A Refreshingly Ominous View" per turn.
2549920.name: A Refreshingly Ominous View

2549926.effect: If you Normal or Special Summon a monsters, including a "Sakekle" Effect Monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand or GY. You can target 1 Set card on the field; destroy it. If you targeted a Spell/Trap by this effect, your opponent cannot activate that target in response to this effect's activation. This is a Quick Effect if you control a DARK "Sakekle" monster. You can only use each effect of "Sakekle Rush" once per turn.
2549926.name: Sakekle Rush

2549930.effect:
3 "Sakekle" monsters
(This card is also always treated as LIGHT.)
If this card is Summoned: Roll a six-sided die for each monster on the field. This card gains ATK/DEF equal to the total roll x 400. If this card is Link Summoned, or if your opponent Special Summons a monster from the Extra Deck: You can target 1 "Sakekle" monster in your GY; Special Summon it in Attack Position to your zone this card points to, and if you do, it cannot be destroyed by card effects this turn. You can only control 1 "Sakekle Strength".
2549930.name: Sakekle Strength

2549936.effect:
2 "Sakekle" monsters
Must first be Special Summoned (from your Extra Deck) by Tributing the above cards you control. (You do not use "Polymerization".) If this card is Summoned: Roll a six-sided die for each monster on the field. This card gains ATK/DEF equal to the total roll x 300. Unaffected by the effects of your opponent's monsters with less ATK. At the end of the Damage Step, if this card attacked an opponent's monster, and your opponent took no damage: You can pay 600 LP; this card gains 600 ATK, and can attack again in a row. You can only control 1 "Sakekle Riser".
2549936.name: Sakekle Riser

2553364.effect: Return any number of "Dark Scorpion" monsters and/or "Don Zaloog" you control to your hand, and if you do, you can return up to that many monsters your opponent controls to the hand. You can banish this card from your GY; place 1 "Dark Scorpion" Spell/Trap from your Deck on the top of your Deck.
2553364.name: Retreat of the Dark Scorpions

2553443.effect: Tribute 1 Warrior monster; add 1 Level 5 or higher Warrior monster from your Deck to your hand.
2553443.name: Leading the Charge

2553861.effect: Once per turn: You can discard 1 Spell, then target 1 monster your opponent controls; destroy that target.
2553861.name: Pholoe the Druid

2553865.effect: If you control no monsters, or if all monsters you control are EARTH monsters: Discard 1 non-Spell; Special Summon 2 Beast-Warrior monsters from your Deck with different names, that each have an effect that activates by discarding a Spell. While this card is in your GY, the effects of Beast-Warrior monsters that activate by discarding a Spell become Quick Effects. You can only activate 1 "Beckon the Stampede".
2553865.name: Beckon the Stampede

2553871.effect: Equip only to a Beast-Warrior monster. It gains ATK and DEF equal to its original DEF and ATK, respectively. If you would discard a Spell to activate the equipped monster's effect, you can send this card to the GY instead. If this card is discarded: You can target 1 monster you control; equip this card to it. You can only use this effect of "Centaurian Bow" once per turn.
2553871.name: Centaurian Bow

2553894.effect: If you control no monsters: You can discard this card; excavate the top 3 cards of your Deck, and if you do, add 1 excavated DARK Insect monster to your hand, also shuffle the rest into the Deck. (Quick Effect): You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 Insect monster you control; banish it until the End Phase. You can only use each effecct of "Entangling Abysser" once per turn.
2553894.name: Entangling Abysser

2555552.effect: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target 1 Spell/Trap in your GY with "WIND Beast" in its text, or 1 monster in your GY that specifically lists "Rooftop Inu" in its text; add it to your hand. During the End Phase, if you control no monsters: You can Special Summon this card from your GY. You can only use each effect of "Scouting Inu" once per turn.
2555552.name: Scouting Inu

2555622.effect: During your Main Phase: You can Special Summon 1 WIND Beast monster from your hand, but negate its effects, unless it specifically lists "Rooftop Inu" in its text. If this card is used as Link or Fusion Material for a WIND Beast monster: You can can draw 1 card, then, if that Link or Fusion Monster is not "Rooftop Inu", or a monster that specifically lists "Rooftop Inu" in its text, place 1 card from your hand on the bottom of your Deck. You can only use each effect of "Ascended Inu" once per turn.
2555622.name: Ascended Inu

2555626.effect: Fusion Summon 1 WIND Beast Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, by using monsters from your hand or field as Fusion Material, and/or banishing Fusion Materials listed on it from your GY. If the only monster(s) you control are in the Extra Monster Zone: You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls; banish it.
2555626.name: Inumerization

2555628.effect: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 Spell/Trap with "WIND Beast" in its text from your Deck to your hand. If an Equip Spell(s) is sent to your GY: You can target 1 of them; add it to your hand. Then, shuffle this card into the Deck, or, if you have a "Rooftop Inu" on your field or in your GY, you can add this card to your hand, instead. You can only use 1 "Invoking Inu" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
2555628.name: Invoking Inu

2555641.effect:
"Invoking Inu" or "Rooftop Inu" + 1 WIND Beast monster
If this card was Fusion Summoned using a Tuner or Link Monster as material, it cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects, and any battle damage you take from battles involving this monster is halved. If your opponent controls a monster with more ATK than this card, this card can attack directly. Once per turn, during your opponent's End Phase: You can target 3 cards in your GY; your opponent chooses 1 for you to place on the top of your Deck, then shuffle the rest into the Deck. If this card is sent from a Monster Zone to the GY: You can banish this card from your GY; Special Summon 1 "Rooftop Inu" from your Extra Deck. (This is treated as a Link Summon.) You can only use this effect of "Astute Inu" once per turn.
2555641.name: Astute Inu

2555671.effect: This card can attack directly. You can only use each of the following effects of "Apprentice Inu" once per turn. If you Normal or Special Summon a monster that specifically lists "Rooftop Inu" in its text: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. When this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent: You can add 1 WIND Beast monster from your GY to your hand, or, if this is the only monster you control, you can Special Summon it, instead.
2555671.name: Apprentice Inu

2555808.effect: Equip only to a WIND Beast monster. It gains 400 ATK, and if it attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage to your opponent. If the only monster(s) you control are in the Extra Monster Zone: You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 monster your opponent controls; banish it.
2555808.name: Art of Piercing

2556543.effect: If you control no monsters, or if you control a monster that specifically lists "Rooftop Inu" in its text: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. You can only Special Summon from the Extra Deck once the turn you activate this effect. (Quick Effect): You can discard this card, then target 1 WIND Beast monster you control and 1 monster your opponent controls; for the rest of this turn, the first target gains ATK equal to the ATK of the second target. You can only use each effect of "Resolute Inu" once per turn.
2556543.name: Resolute Inu

2556549.effect: When this card is activated: You can add 1 card from your Deck to your hand that specifically lists "Rooftop Inu" in its text, except "Peace and Comfort". Once per turn, during your Main Phase 1: You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; its effects cannot be activated this turn, also, if it is still face-up on the field at the end of the Battle Phase, you can banish it. If you control a WIND Beast monster, you can negate an activated card effect that would destroy a card(s) you control, then destroy this card. You can only activate 1 "Peace and Comfort" per turn.
2556549.name: Peace and Comfort

2558427.effect: If this card is Normal Summoned: You can target 1 LIGHT and 1 DARK monster in your GY; equip them to this card as Equip Spells that make it gain 500 ATK/DEF. If this face-up card leaves the field during your opponent's turn: You can Special Summon any number of LIGHT and/or DARK monsters from your GY that were equipped to this card, but their effects cannot be activated this turn. You can only use this effect of "Alayion, Render of Worlds" once per turn.
2558427.name: Alayion, Render of Worlds

2561005.effect:
2+ Level 3 WATER monsters
For this card's Xyz Summon, you can treat 1 "Atlantean" monster you control as a Level 3 monster. If this card is Xyz Summoned: You can detach 1 material from this card; add 1 "Atlantean" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Legendary Atlantean Ancaeus" once per turn. Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 other WATER monster in your GY; attach it to this card as material.
2561005.name: Legendary Atlantean Ancaeus
